content: --ग्रहः, --ग्रहणं {1} seizing by the throat, throttling, smothering. {2} a kind of disease. {3} <ab>N.</ab> of certain days in the dark fortnight of a month:-- {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} the 4th, 7th, 8th, 9th, 13th and the three following days. {4} a day on which a course of study is commenced, but immediately preceding a day on which it is prohibited. {5} study. begun but immediately interrupted.
